I Agree To The Term Of Use And Privacy Policy Of Sky Premium Member Club
I Agree to the Membership Agreement
The payment in the case of bank transfer will be annual.

This payment applies only for those who want to upgrade the status from Gold to Platinum. The difference of the monthly membership fee between Gold and Platinum is USD50/month, and this difference x the rest of the contract months needs to be paid.
Please note that the settlement name of SKY PREMIUM which appears on your credit card statement will be [AXES SOLUTIONS].
Your contract is waiting for admin confirmation to upgrade to platinum member successfully.
Click here to cancel your upgrade contract request.
(Your AXES\'s ID is 1562, please enter this to the ID input field on AXES\'s page)
※Bank transfer: Bank transfer is used for payment of annual fee only. The different fee occurred by middle-upgrade will be paid separately.

※Please understand that we don’t inherit your payment information used in Samurai Station base on personal information protection view point. But, the payment method “Bank transfer” on the new system includes “Lump-sum payment by Credit card” method which was used in Samurai Station.
Please skip it if you don’t have a coupon code
It is the time to update your annual contract
Please update your contract using the below screen
"Monthly payment" is available only credit card
Please note that the settlement name of SKY PREMIUM which appears on your credit card statement will be [AXES SOLUTIONS].
※ Only credit card payment accept monthly payment
※ 「月額払い」はクレジットカードのみご利用いただけます

本当に契約登録を 行いますか？
Do you really want to extend the contract?
本当に契約更新を 行いますか？
Your contract is waiting for admin confirmation to extend successfully.
ご契約更新は事務局の承認待ちとなります。
ご利用規約にご同意頂いた場合、規約内容に同意されたものとみなされます。
SKY PREMIUM の会員規約及びプライバシー ポリシーに同意する
銀行振り込みの場合、年間一括でのお支払いとなります

This payment applies only for those who want to upgrade the status from Gold to Platinum. The difference of the monthly membership fee between Gold and Platinum is USD50/month, and this difference x the rest of the contract months needs to be paid.
※SKY PREMIUM の決済名は【AXES SOLUTIONS】になります。お客様のクレジットカード明細に表示される名称になりますので、お間違えのない様にお願いいたします。
Your contract is waiting for admin confirmation to upgrade to platinum member successfully.
Click here to cancel your upgrade contract request.
(Your AXES\'s ID is 1562, please enter this to the ID input field on AXES\'s page)
※Bank transfer: Bank transfer is used for payment of annual fee only. The different fee occurred by middle-upgrade will be paid separately.

※Please understand that we don’t inherit your payment information used in Samurai Station base on personal information protection view point. But, the payment method “Bank transfer” on the new system includes “Lump-sum payment by Credit card” method which was used in Samurai Station.
クーポンコードをお持ちでない方は空欄でお手続きください。
